snippet.title: Mediterranea Inferno – Steam Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2103680/Mediterranea_Inferno/ Mediterranea Inferno is launching on Steam this August 24th 2023. Demo available now, save state carries to the full game! Explore the inner demons of three childhood friends on a summer retreat. Unearth secrets, fears and obsessions as you help them reconnect and rediscover themselves. A mature and treacherous visual novel from the creator of Milky Way Prince – The Vampire Star.
